column4: for GAIM, which file should i download...   gaim-2.0.0beta5.tar.bz2    or   gaim-2.0.0beta5.tar.gz   ?
they're pretty much going to be identical. they're just different archive formats
first, you're going to want to uninstall or divert ubuntu's gaim, though
i just  uninstall gaim now... what do i need to do to install with the source code?
ok, first put it in some out-of-the-way spot and unpack it. let me know when you're ready to go on.
im already ready, but i can't find the archive that i downloaded it on.. desktop?
sorry, i'm not sure what you mean.
but it isnt showing on my desktop?
well, i don't know anything about gnome per s, but anyway, what you should do is move it somewhere out-of-the-way. i, for example, have a ~/src dir
sorry.. im here, but i have guests right now... ;)
oh! well, real people are way more important than anything online
